name: Dear John
description:
Dear player,
welcome to our take on the Virtus Winter Game Jam 2018.
We created a rather calm game for you to explore.

The controls are simple:
LMB -->  pick up
C --> open clipboard
E --> examine/interact
WASD --> move

We hope you have fun inside of the little world we created.
(It might have some sharp edges, so try not to get cut)

--> We didn't finish this project, but we hope you enjoy it anyways :)

All assets are selfmade and were made within 48 hours before the deadline. So yeah. Last minute development right here.
